SummaryEnglish: The Jelly Martial Arts Academy was originally a harmonious place, where the jellies study and play happily. Unexpectedly, an uninvited guest came one day——Zhoumeishuyan, he is one of the four evil thieves. Disturbed the tranquility in the academy. In order to maintain peace, the abbot drove Ye Yan, Shangguan Ziyi and others to Tianshan Mountain. And he gave the three swords left by his master to Cheng Liuxiang, Pineapple Chuixue and Lu Xiaoguo. The Guobao Special Attackers heard that the big devil Dongfang Qiubai and the four evil thieves poisoned the colorful lotus and harmed the villagers, so they made up their minds to eliminate the harm for the people.
